summary: The lives of a young man and woman, an infamous gangster and a group of street kids converge one day in a volatile New York City slum.
cast: Sylvia Sidney|Joel McCrea|Humphrey Bogart|Wendy Barrie|Claire Trevor|Allen Jenkins|Marjorie Main|Billy Halop|Huntz Hall|Bobby Jordan|Leo Gorcey|Gabriel Dell|Bernard Punsly|Charles Peck|Minor Watson|James Burke|Ward Bond|Elisabeth Risdon|Esther Dale|George Humbert|Marcelle Corday|Earl Askam|Don 'Red' Barry|Wade Boteler|Al Bridge|Lucile Browne|Audrey Carol|Gilbert Clayton|G. Pat Collins|Jerry Cooper|Bill Dagwell|Bud Geary|Wesley Giraud|Charles Halton|Larry Harris|Robert Homans|Esther Howard|Thomas E. Jackson|Payne B. Johnson|Sidney Kibrick|Maude Lambert|Paula Hariette Levy|Kathryn Ann Lujan|Mickey Martin|Mona Monet|Tom Randall|Tom Ricketts|Norman Salling|Hugh Sheridan|Frank Shields|Walter Soderling|Charlotte Treadway|Gertrude Valerie
title: Calle sin salida
